title: Reaction to Patrick Mahomes' 10-Year Contract Extension
itunes:title: Reaction to Patrick Mahomes' 10-Year Contract Extension
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. The guys start off by reacting to the news of Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes' 10-year contract extension and look at how the Chiefs should build around him (:25). Next, Bucky discusses what he learned from a Zoom call last week with coaches (20:41). Then, DJ gives advice to scouts about how they can stand out during this pandemic (25:56). After that, the pair evaluate a college player they think highly of (32:43). To wrap up the show, DJ talks about a story his dad told him and what he got from it (40:45).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
